mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select u.email_id as email_id, u.email_name as name, u.country as cname, u.language as vlanguage, u.creat_time as creat_time, v.chinese as country, x.chinese as language, u.isdel as isdel from tm_email u left join tm_parameter v on u.country = v.para_value left join tm_parameter x on u.language = x.para_value where u.isdel = 0 and v.isdel = 0 and x.isdel = 0 order by u.creat_time ) table_alias limit #{b},#{e}
select count(u.email_id) from tm_email u where u.isdel = 0
mapper.insert: insert into tm_mailqueue( order_id, mail_type, acount, sendname, sender, reciever, subject, content, file_url, mail_status, creat_time )values( #{orderid}, #{mailtype}, #{acount}, #{sendname}, #{sender}, #{reciever}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{fileurl}, #{mailstatus}, NOW() )
mapper.update: update tm_email set email_name=#{name}, country=#{country}, language=#{language}, update_time=NOW() where email_id=#{email_id}
mapper.select: select u.email_id as email_id, u.email_name as name, u.country as country, u.language as language, u.isdel as isdel from tm_email u where u.email_id = #{email_id}
select u.para_domain, u.para_value as id, u.chinese as text, u.isdisplay, u.isdel from tm_parameter u where u.isdisplay = 1 and u.isdel = 0 and u.para_domain = #{domain}
mapper.update: update tm_email set isdel=1 where email_id = #{email_id}
mapper.select: select u.chinese as chinese, u.english as english from tm_parameter u where u.isdisplay = 1 and u.isdel = 0 and u.para_domain = #{domain} and u.para_value = #{value}
select u.customer_name_zh as chinese, u.customer_name_en as english from tm_customer u where u.isdel = 0 and u.customer_id = #{id}
select u.sales_name as chinese, u.sales_name_en as english from tm_sales u where u.isdel = 0 and u.sales_id = #{id}
